abstract: In a win for activist investor William Ackman, Target announced Monday that it had struck a deal to sell a 47 percent interest in credit card receivables to JPMorgan Chase for an initial investment of $3.6 billion.
lead_paragraph: In a win for activist investor William Ackman, Target announced Monday that it had struck a deal to sell a 47 percent interest in credit card receivables to JPMorgan Chase for an initial investment of $3.6 billion.

headline.main: Target Bends to Ackman In Credit-Card Deal With JPMorgan
